summary:
This mod changes the Detect Life spell such that enemies and friendly
NPCs are displayed using the same color. You\'ll no longer magically know
who is friendly and who is foe.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This mod changes the Detect Life spell such that enemies and friendly
NPCs are displayed using the same color. You\'ll no longer magically know
who is friendly and who is foe.


Install
=======
1. Extract this archive to your Skyrim Data folder. The Data folder can
   be found under the directory where you installed Steam. It is usually
   something like:

   c:\\program files\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data

2. Activate the mod by clicking on Data Files in the Skyrim Launcher and
   checking the check box next to the mod\'s name.

3. Start the game.


Uninstall
=========
1. Delete or rename the following files from under your Skyrim Data
   directory:

   Data\\Immersive Detect Life Spell.esp
   Data\\Immersive Detect Life Spell - README.txt


Incompatibilities
=================
This mod is incompatible with any other mod that changes the Detect Life


History
=======
1.0, 2012-01-16 - Initial release.


Contact
=======
You can send me a Personal Message (PM) on the official Elder Scrolls
forums. All updates to this mod will be posted on
http://www.skyrimnexus.com.


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Dave Humphrey for making SkyEdit.
Thanks to lhammonds for the Readme Generator that this file is based on.
author: Silverglade
